values:
I'm here at weeza's house, invading her room and computer!!!! so since i no longer have a job at the college center due to the fact that it's summer i am sooooo bored at home and that is why i invade peoples homes.anyways.... santa cruz here i come!!!!!! luisa is my crazy lesbian roomate lover, and we have fixed our classes so that we can party hardy on fridays!!!!! muahahahaah. we found out crazy Ivan R. is to join us in our banana slug endeavors. it sadens me that my sugar crazed boy is no longer joining us in our crazy slug world, but i hope he has fun in Hawaii for the time being. 
well it has been forever since i've written and i well thats all i have to say. oh i can't wait to see willy wonka @ the IMAX with my buddies. loooking forward to it u guys!!!!:)

....more ot write in later days....keeping this livejournal alive.....
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/8531.html

.... rilo kiley kicks ass... can' t wait to get the cranberries... listening to Bright eyes... maybe Kathy should go see Bright eyes... oh but interpool.. me likey "slow hands"... i like that keane song, whats it called?... if anyone knows what im talking about you tell me! damn now i cant remember, but its slow and i like it... 

i likey the movie GARDEN STATE its funny and very well made. Kathy got me wanting to see french movies!!! i want to see eternal sunshone of the spotless mind. Has anyone seen it? i heard it was good...................................knitting.............................................

i refuse to read fankenstein, i dont want toread it right now.... im bored, oh hehe... carlos bought his first pack of ciggys, i found that hilarious... 

SLEEPY SLEEPY.........SLEEPY SLEEPY...........SLEEPY SLEEPY............................

still felling kind of glum and confused but im better of just distracting myself by making myself busy....................knitting...................................oh yeah thank you ppl for you comments.... but saying comforting words isnt gonna help me really... i figure i either let it pass (feelings come and go), busy myself (as i said) or just figure things out myself....... thanks anyways though, that was nice of those who said something, again... i just gotta ponder stuff over.....

i need to do my essay for loyola marymount......... dont wanna!!!!!
oh yeah, i fell on friday.... and i was frozen in the rain by my steps.... my back and elbow are bruised, and now my arms hurt like hell( not relating to me falling) man i got to see my chiropractor!!!!!!!!:(


i'm addicted to music and knitting..........
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/8396.html

im staring at a blank paper..... thinking if i should do my math and history homework.... i dont think thats going to happen... good news: mom made enchiladas...goood!!!! im gonna take me some for lunch tomorrow.
im a lil' off centre... i dont feel well balanced... i need a change of scenery... i kinda feel like i don't belong anywhere, im just there kinda taking up space... i dont know?... im confused....... believe it or not im looking forward to graduating and leaving... weird! 
i feel like im missing something.... missing out...kinda apathetic... lethargic... i dont know? a little lost..... bemused...



INSIDE, IM LOST!!!! AND OUTSIDE I PUT ON A HAPPY FACE, ....... this garden state soundtrack is making me sad for some reason, but i love it!!!!!!!!! muco thanx to that scobby doo kid!

time for noe more talking.... staring at the blank paper..............
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/8084.html

today i went to the movies to see Meet the fockers, i laughed.. it was a very funny movie. Memo to myself: new years resolution: go to movies less, i have been going to the movies too much!!!
So it was me, weeza, apu, and nach...... oh and apu's new name is crotch wheels while nacho's new name is booty. we took the bus, got there not knowing what we were gonna see and after much deliberation we decide to see meet the fockers. went to the arcade, then two starbucks, got a brain freeza b/c they made me drink my frapuccino fast!!! apu said wonka was a rascist and im gonna kick his ass, b/c he made me choke on my drink. oh, and he tried to kill me with a airhockey puck. oh and he hurt my already injured hand. ( i think apu was out to kill me) lol memo to myself: give crotch wheels an ass wooping.... ok so we saw the movie, as i said before, i laughed and i liked it, ppl were fockerized, it was all good. umm wento to weezas house where i got me a present: a scarf ( which i had to close my eyes for b/c it wasnt wraped with the other present) and a shaver, you know to shave my beard... ok well not my beard but weeza showed me her before i got mine and i liked it, its all electronic and what not.... so thank ya weeza... hey but are you trying to tell me something.... that i have hairy legs... because i do but no one needs to know that hehe jk, loved the gift... thanx!!!!

ok i had fun today.. but now off my fun subject...................................

ARROGANCE IS STUPIDITY......
arrogant ppl are stupid, thinking your better than someone dosent make your better than that person, it just makes you stupid... in fact thinking your better than that person only makes you less than that person because you think less of them. how dare you arrogant ppl show your face in this world, its ppl like you who make this world a stupid self centered world that it is, with superficial ppl. ARROGANCE only leads to vanity. actually stupid ppl are in fact smarter than the arrogant. It gets me so mad to think that people think they are better than others when they are clearly not, no one is better than anyone, yes of course some ppl are better off, they may not be sick or poor, but that doesnt give them the right attacke someone who isnt as well off. just because your well off dioesnt make you better than anyone else. and the only all ppl are created equal crap is just a saying b/c if were all creted equal we would all be treated with the same respect but we aren't...... some ppl are just mean and dumb and aroogant and ruthless. im also mad at the discrimanting of ppl or the racism in this world. and if you really think about we are all a little discrimanated or discriminators and we may not realize it, and we are all a liitle aroogant. when we dont like someone we dont think much of them and that kind of makes us a little arrogant, so im arrogant... your arrogant ... evryones arrogant... and we cant help who we like and dont like... even if the person is really mean, obnoxious, concided or whatever. i dont know why i started this mad ranting of mine... it probably doesnt make sense but its just something to think about.     Its amazing how we are all so different yet the same..... it really boggles the mind....
oh wells 
see ya all in school

Twnetiy four oceans, twenty four skies
twnty four failures, in twenty four tries
twenty four finds me, in twenty fourth place
with twenty four dropouts, at the end of the day

life is not what i thought it was, twenty four hours ago
still im singing Spiit take me up in arms with you
and im not who i thought i was, twenty four hours ago
still im singing Spirit take me up in arms with you

twenty four reaasons, to admit that im wrong
with all my excuses, still twenty four strong

but see im not coping out , not coping out, not coping out
when your raising the dead in me

oh, i am the second man, 
oh, i am the secong man now
oh i am the second man now

And your raising these twenty four voices
with tenty four hearts
with all my symphonies, in twenty four parts
but i want one today
centred and true
im singing spirit take me up with you

chorus

i want to see miracles
to see the world change
i wrestled an angel
for more than a name
for more than a felling
for more than a cause
spirit take me up in arms with you

your raising the dead in me....... repeat chorus



sorry... i like this song ppl, deal with it!!!
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/7652.html

well first off i want to wish you all a belated christmas!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ok next off..... who got great presents, cuz i know i did hehehehe. ok i got clothes (good and pretty  ones, although i didnt get my oldnavy ones :( but oh wells) i got my LOTR return of the king dvd extended edition... its great if your asking..... oh and i got my switchfoot CD!!!!!! well those are the presents worth mentioning, not that the other suck, but most of my presents were either clothes or money, oh and starbucks giftcards!!!!!!!!! im gonna be loading up on white mocha Fraps very soon!!!!
ok i love my switchfoot CD, im addicted to the song, i have em all memorized hehee. oh, i almost forget ... i went  to see closer....... hehe that was adirty movie, there was actually never a sex scene, it was all just dirty with stripping and cyber chatting (guy on guy action jude and clive lol) those who have seen it know what im talking about.  well it was kinky and a lil pervy but i liked it nonetheless, i was funny well scripted, good movie!!! *in my opinion* oh but you want to know what i got out of the movie... that we are all liars, men are pigs and women are whores, and i laugh at that!!!! ok but ppl should go see it, i think jose and carlitos enjoyed the movie toooo much hehehe, jk, but i did have to cover carlitos eyes, hes too young lol. ok im hyper!!!!!!! im loadedon sugar b/c ppl gave me lots of candy for christmas!!!! hehe yummmm!!! i also saw a SERIES OF UNFORTUNATE EVENTS, i was lil mad cuz it wasnt like the book, but i also liked it, it was okay... b ut the books are better..... but i see why they made the movie that way......
anywaysishould go, i still have a lot of homework to do damn biology and dracula!!!! hey WEEZA:, i think im gonna do all the bio notes except ch 53 seeing as how you already did that one. ok well i call youn later or something!!!!

thank mayra for taking us and bringing us back from the movies!!!!!!!!!!!! sorry if you got in trouble!!! dont worry i luv ya!! :)

ok people, well i want to wish every one the best on this new year to come... so HAPPY new years!!!!!! hope you have fun ppl, dont drink too much!!!!!!!!!!!!!


" GONE like frank sinatra GONE like elvis and his mom, GONE like al pacinos cash... nothing ever lasts in life...... life is more than fame and rock and roll and thrills....she said he said live like no tomorrow...." ~SWITCHFOOT
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/7293.html

i had fun!
so yesterday and today me and weeza went to the school, our way there was funny , shes crazy,  we almost get runover a few times. people don't know how to drive, or i dont't know how to walk. i think its a lil of both, ummm... oh yeah i freeloaded off her food and we watched tv.. something aboiut celebrities getting pumped crap out from their butts. Very disturbing!!! i forget what it is called but what they do is that they put a tube up your crack (you may or may not feel a sensation) and the they pump out all the bad stuff in you, which pretty much dehydrates you and makes you skinny. i thouhgt this was both funny and disturbing at the same time! i think Society today is really retarded! i mean, people see these celebrities today and they all want o follow in that image, where skinny is beautiful and so people do anything to get skinny. that isn't healthy, people take pills with ephandren and that is way bad for you because its preety much speed that your taking. but oh wells enough about society, weeza is a funny one, we saw a crazy lady today who scared the hell out of me, almost giving me a heart attack!!! she was in her chair with her back facing the street and a scarf over her head like a hood, and she would move all freaky like. it scared me:( then we went to buy some pizza and some guy gave us 5 cents, we were looking for a penny. a dog attacked me on the way to school, and we watched my extended edition of the two towers all lazy like! .... weeza has her christmas tree in the middle of the room and i told her to leave it there, oh and im gonna steal her fishy, she has a cute bumblebee fish.
when i got home today i talked to georgey, i hadn't talked to him in the longest, it was good times, oh and then i called other friends like candy and we talked for hours, my battery of my cell phone died and then i just continued my conversation on my house phone. so i think i may go out tomorrow

.. oh yeah... weeza reminded me of when jose ran over velasco's foot a while back, that was freakin' hilarious! hahahaahahaaha lol oh my gosh now i can't stop laughing, man that was a funny moment... jose didnt even know he ran him over and carlos didn't even tell him, we were just laughing!!!! man, GOOD TIMES!!!!!!!!!!!!!:)
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/7027.html

so on the weekend i went o go see oceans twelve, i liked it very much. i also rented some movies. i saw Man on Fire, and i liked that one, i thought that one was really good, umm i also saw Saved finally, it was cool too. then i saw spiderman 2 again because my dad hadn't seen it, but i did not object to renting it. umm he also rented that dumb jackie chan movie Around the world in 80 days, that was a lame kiddy movie. DONT WATCH IT!! well unless you want to be bored out of your mind for two damn hours!!!
Tiffany told me that she doesn't have to read Dracula, i don't want to read it either!!!!! how dare she!!!!!! well i don't want to read what she has to read instead either... 
... regarding the subject of this journal, i was bored so i translated my name to a hobbit name, i know i'm weird. well so thats my name. then i saw a icon of johnny depp in his willy wonka movie, and now amma use it as my icon. he looks crazy in that movie. he has fake teeth and whaty not so when he smile he looks all psycho-ed out!!!!

i had a freaky dream in the night!!!! it was scary and i dont want to write about it because it made me cry!!! i didnt likey my dream!!! i refuse to type now because thinking about it made me sad and all paranoid.      ~Namaarie*farewell*
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/6767.html

ok so here i am, finally typing some crap.
umm lets see.. today i was supposed to go to school to get some stuff done for my private school applications, but i didnt because im a lazy one, and i went to velascos house for no reason, i didnt even turn in those dumb papers. Man i have a whole mess of crap  to do in order to get into a damn school. i don't know why universities just don't let you in. i mean, as long as your not a serial arsonist or anything, you would have nothin' to worry about; but no, you have to fill out all this crap, you have to send all this crap, and write all this crap. this is hurtful for the hands and stressful for the kid especially a lazy one. I'm TIRED, and i have no idea what i want to do with my life. I figure i'll figure it out sooner or later. hopefully....
oh, and i found out that there are people who are more lost than i am when it comes to applications, and that teens are such procrastinators.. well i already kinda knew the last one.
ok so i walked my dog all around the blocks near my casa, she had fun, i was just observing ppls houses and christmas decorations. I'm supposed to be reading now, but im too lazy.

oh, last week i went to the movies with mari, it was cool we talked and we saw bridget jones II. that was my first rated R movie i saw in the theatres.... legally. oh and then we snuck into that sponge bob movie for no apparent reason, we didnt likey the movie, i have no idea why we were in there. maybe it's because the theatre was so damn empty it was easier to sneak into a movie. thats odd. you would think that a full theatre would be easier because there are so many damn ppl. i think that because there are more ppl i think there are also more ppl working in the theater and the less people the less they care. and because there were hardly anybody, people were not doing there job. ahha, i got it, i came to a conclusion all on my own. ......ok that was lame..... yeah so i had fun.....umm  the next on my list is to see CLOSER, and the Series of Unfortunate Events., but i have to finish the books for that one. oh, yeah i composed a song on some gargage band thing on this macintosh. i like it, its the coolest, i went all crazy one day trying to find beats that went along with the rest of my song. hey, i think i might just burn it on to a CD. 

... well i think i'm leaving somewhere this weekend, I'm just not quite sure where. i'm hoping its too the snow b/c i like snow:),(not yellow snow or fecal snow, thats nasty ewww) but i dont think it is. i really want to learn how to ski or snowboard, they're both cool. ok i'm off..... to see the wizard the wonderful wizard of oz. lalalaalala
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/6404.html

ok, i haven't been up too much, i read what i'm not supposed to, and watch the tele like a bum. i have a few things to write about, but i don't have time. people have been telling me to write but i guess they will have to wait  a bit more, ummm i got stuff to say but nevermind, ill write tommorow.
oh i composed a song, thats cool, all right..........night night!
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/6289.html

Vacations can kind of  be depressing at times. i know its barley started and im bored out of my mind, i read and listen to Rilo KIley all day which makes me sad, damn that Rilo Kiley. Vacations are very lonely, im cold all the time, damn whether, i go out im cold, im inside im cold.... i no likey this......
The last day of school was crap!!!! i was sick, and my eyes were always tearing!!!!! I wasn't where i wanted to be, the only people i really saw and talked to were the twins. lets just say that i ve had better days.

irrelevant......
       i dont want to be mad at you or anyone for that matter... but i am...why....things take time to get better...

      you are not the same... you've changed.. i've changed...it's like i don't you any more, i dont know anyone anymore... everything seems different...

     why do i feel like this... feelings of happiness... anger... frustration... confusion.. sadness... ignored.. uncertain.. bewildered... upset...uplifted.. excited........................emotions i dont understand!
I can't judge you because your my...

        You only need me when your down...you only see me with a frown...you dont need me but i DON'T care...you only see what isn't there... You dont need me but i DO care... you only see what isn't fair.... I can't judge you because your my... I can't judge you because your my...
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/5930.html

ok so lately ive kinda been mad and sad at the world and my life. Why, who knows, its a lot of reaons actually. lIfe is stressing, and it weird cuz when i want to talk to someone nothing will come out and then im just left with me never coming back to that idea.  aND Its weird cuz ill listen to peoples problems for days and ill give my input at times, it just that when it comes to my lame problems, i fell that i am not able to share them. I know i know, people tell me were here for you, you can talk to us, see thats the thing, ive mentioned that before, i cant, i physiccaly can, but my mindset is like elsewhere and im not able to show the real mood behind me. or when someone asks, i wont tell, for some strange unknown reason.im weird like that, i seriously think that i should see a therapist, oh and i should relly got see my doctor, cuz my migraines have recently been reoccuring. that leads me to another subject....
i now have migraines b/c im too streesed out, man dumb preparing for the future, wanting to get into a 4 year university me. Sometimes i wishi had an extra year, but not as a year where i would be doing the same thing or preparing for school and stuff, i mean, i want a year away from it all. I want to leave like far, but at the same time i don't, i kind of fear the future.There are times where i wish i could just get up one day and got to some far away place where no one knows me and i could start all over, and live carefree, but i know thats a fabtasy in my head, and one really cant live like that. so i go this thing from st. luois university or something like that; it was talking about studying for two years in madrid or someplace they speak spanish and you like live there for two or depending on your major, more years. i actually considered doing that. I want to go out and see the world. i wan to travel, new zealand here i come.

.... so lately ive also been missing the good ol'days.. i found myself writng a letter to a friend during 3rd period, well it started out as a letter to my friend, and then i began to rable on about stuff, in my saddened mood. i would type it but its too long to type, well i was rambling on about some of the stuff i had mentioned about missing the good ol days, living carefree, me not being able to sleep lately, my headaches, my B.S about me not able to show emotions, but ill cry for some stupid sappy movie, how i hold back a lot about myself, crushes and how i havent found me a guy, i know pathetic, and basically life in general.......well my letter wasnt quite finished because someone stopped me and made me laugh. i realized that no matter how down i  am laughter can always make you feel better, and humor is not the easiest thing because what can be funny to some may not be funny to others.. So anyways, i thiought to myslef about humor and how it  can make one feel better and it got me out of my mood for the moment.  and humor is the greatest thing, when ones laughing, they arent going to be thinking about the bad things, its great!!!  maybe that should have been my greatest. oh wells.     laughter Is fun!!!!

so i leave you with soe quotes:
         *** life is too important to take seriously*** ~Henry J. Tillmen
         *** lazziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired*** ~Jules Renard
         *** Laughter is by defintion healthy*** ~Doris Lessing
         *** You can't deny laughter, when it comes, it plops down in your favorite chair  and stays as long as it wants*** ~Stephen King
         *** Laugh and the world laughs with you...*** ~A. Burgess

ps: mari, i miss my ramones cd, if you remember can you return it too me, cuz i always forget to tell you at school!!!!!
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/5716.html

Thanks for all your ppls comments, im better for the moment, i guess you can say that, thanx for  the love, regarding carlos' comment, see thats the thing, i cant tell ppl things, i cant express myself the way everyone else does, i know thats one of my faults, im trying to work on it. I ahve trouble confronting people with my problems. i know i probably should cuz it would probabaly help me if i talk it out with a firend but .. i dont know... im trying.... well thanks people. 
so i was listening to that song that i heard when i was on my conformation retreat and it got me thinking, in a good way. well im dont feel the way i did yesterday, i kind of still feel distant and stuff at times, but i hope it goes away, ill do my best to express myself, but no guarantees, well we will see.
http://crazyelf-23.livejournal.com/5493.html

ok, just for the record, i state that i am not addicted to my satelite. ok ....

Have you ever just felt distant? cuz thats how ive been feeling lately, like i just dont belong anywhere. Its some crazy stuff, i dont like it at all, but i cant help feeling this way. im distant with my friends , im distant with my family and with everyone else around me. Its a horrible feeling, i just fell like letting it all out, but thats not me... im not the kind of person who does that... im in a weird state of mind. I feel many things at this moment i just can't explain... 
this week ive been kind of grouchy and mean and i know i have probably done something to someone that they probabaly mistook, i just want to apologize to everyone for my mood, i havent gotten enough sleep, and i feel all weird. Im not happy at school and i'm not happy at home, i dont know what to do. again, im in my own lil world... I dont mean to be all mean and distant, but im irratated with myself....
... I FEEL ALL BLAH, i dont know whats up with me, i can't think properly... :( I'm starting to miss people, and it s weird cuz some of the people i miss are around me everyday. i do however, miss my grandma for some strange odd reason, i miss my buddy candy, i miss christopher and angie, believe it or not i actually miss my 1st grade friend stephanie, and i miss my life back in the good old days. I try not to think of these deprssing things but sometimes i cant hel[p myself, i cant put up that happy face anymore, i try, but i just keep telling myslef... "for what? Why do i need to be happy for others when im not happy inside?" WHATEVERS, i dont know what to think anymore, i guess you can say im kind of depressed, but im more of just .... i odnt know how to explain....

Im glad i have this journal, because if i didnt i wouldnt know how to express myself, because i guess you can say im a coward in person when it comes to how i feel.
 i guess thats enough depressing stuff for today, ... i went o the dodgers game yesterday... they lost against the marlins... who am i kidding i cant act all normal now, im just too out of it now to write  about what i did yesterday...
 
 tommorow is a new day
 tommorow is a new beginning
 will it be a happy day?
 how will the day end?
 decisions to make
 questions to ask
 thats how life goes...

Senior day is coming up, i wann dress all crazy like, hehehe, velasco is gonna wear a kilt like sam baca, welll thats if his mama makes it for him; that would be some funny stuff to see. then people will get away from his crotch and others will get closer, lol (velasco knows what i mean, or at least i think he does)vEALSCO IS A FUNNY CHARACTER-= I LAUGH AT YOU CARLOS. i seriously wanna go all spirited and crazy on senior day, sounds like fun!!! oh crap i have to do bio notes, meh, me no want to!! damn school!!
   lol, wanna know something funny that happene toady? i was late to 3rd period, so i had to geta blue slip hehe, damn jones!!! well i get all testy and talked back to ms. kremens (however you spell it) it was some funny stuff, but whatevers, now i have another detention hour, retarded school!! ok whatevers, ill leave you peeps with a song...

so im listening to some coldplay, because you can never tire of coldplay no matter how much you listen to it. So beautiful. anyways...
     On friday i ate burritos with marisela, marisol and velasco. there was some cops outside cuz some gangsters were fighting or what not, crazy carlos  and mari were all saying the guy talked to us, and all he asked was if they were in line, i find that hilarious. i thought they meant like full SENTENCESSSSS!! HEEH crazy ones. Anyways, i wasgonna go get my eyebrows done for my year book pisture which was to take place on saturday. so i waited fo my sisters to arrive so they could take me. Wewent to this place called Ziba's. its cool cuz they do your eyebrows with a string. crazy huh? well now my eyebrows are thiner. it didnt hurt. the lady who did them was nice they were all like indian-ish and they were talking there own language. it was funny i was paying attention to two ladys who were talking another language, it was some intersting stuff. 
     So saturday i went to go take my senior yearbook photo at 10 AM, i took wezza with me. the dumb crazy guy who took my picture was dorky. he was all trying to converse withme and weeza and make us smile and show our braces. that loser!! then i couldnt help but laugh at him when he was taking my picture. he made me tilt my head like a doggy. i was like what if i blink, cuz i tend to blink when im photgraphed. hes all like dont worry. i was like easy for you to say, its not youbeing photgraphed. he was a strange man. it was some funny stuff though. oh yeah when we were all done coming out crappy on our pics, we were heading to the car, and what do you know, my daddy left the keys in the car. i had a good laugh. well we took a ride with weezas mom. we hollared at her to pick us up. that was some funny stuff. got home and watched some movies on HBO- BY THE WAY I NOW HAVE SATELLITE AND IM ADDICTED TO THE tv!!!! 
    sunday... tried doing my homework, but couldnt stop watching tv, so it took me a while. My daddy made some carne asada, it was yummy. watched some more movies, ate some food, yeah crazy weekend. well, now im online on fastweb seeing some scholarships available to me, college is stressing me out, but meh! ...
i know i have more to say but nothing comes to mind so ill leave it that!
" your always up to no good"-phaontom planet
"By the time they started showing up, I ran the risk of blowing up
These times, these times get tough 
So if i stay we're going to see who's had enough
By the time i needed backing up, ya he was watching, cracking up
This time, this time it's tough
Well here I am now and i think I've had enough" big brat 
-phantom Planet
